de.edgesoft.refereemanager.controller.editdialogs

Interface IEditDialogController

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    ITabbedEditDialogController<T>
    All Known Implementing Classes:

    Interface for the edit dialog controller.

      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      javafx.stage.Stage getDialogStage()
      Returns dialog stage.
      void handleCancel()
      Stores non-ok click and closes dialog.
      void handleOk()
      Validates input, stores ok click, and closes dialog; does nothing for invalid input.
      boolean isOkClicked()
      Returns if user clicked ok.
      void setDialogStage(javafx.stage.Stage theStage)
      Sets dialog stage.
      void setOkClicked(boolean isOKClicked)
      Sets if user clicked ok.
